mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" JOIN "MEMBER" USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = 2 AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT BOARD_NO,BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT,MEMBER_NO, PROFILE_IMG, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_NAME_TWO,BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - WRITE_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - WRITE_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - WRITE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END WRITE_DATE,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) COMMENT_COUNT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LIKE_COUNT,
(SELECT IMG_PATH || IMG_RENAME FROM BOARD_IMG I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND IMG_ORDER = 0) THUMBNAIL
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN "CATEGORY_TYPE" USING(CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN "CATEGORY_TYPE_TWO" USING(CATEGORY_CODE_TWO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND B.BOARD_CODE = 2 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
